The Village of Oceana

Oceana is a small sea side village nestled deep in The Glowing Forest along the coast of The Crimson Sea. The village built itself up around #The Vanguard Institute of Adventurers. They have their own #Blacksmith and #Leatherworker. #The Church of The Phoenix made a home in Oceana as well. Though their congregation is small, it is still present.

The Vanguard Institute of Adventurers

The Vanguard Institute of Adventurers is a prestigious school for the Vanguard Institute and those of of the Vanguard Institute are highly sought after upon their graduation and initiation into the Vanguard Institute.

The headmaster of the institution is Saleh Araleth.

The Barracks

A group of buildings were all training adventurers stay as well as any visiting adventurers and dignitaries to the Vanguard Institute stay.

The Raven Tower

The highest tower of the Vanguard Institute, it is home to most magical and esoteric studies and is the largest library with in all the Vanguard Institute. The peak of the tower is a raven's perch upon which Bryta perches. The top floor is home to the waifs under Saleh Araleth's custody.

Armory

A building which houses all the weapons and supplies an Adventurer might ever want.

Training Center

The Training Center consists of several classrooms and outdoor facilities that cater to teaching adventurers any skill that might be needed while out in the world, which also includes a ballroom. All Vanguard Institute Adventurer's are required to take a politics and cultural society class so they do not embarrass the Vanguard name.

Stables

The Vanguard Institute also trains horses for their adventurers and the stables have only the best horses in training. Each adventurer if accepted into the Vanguard is given a well trained horse.

Whisper

Rider: Austin Watts
Description: Whisper is an old horse whose majestic presence tells tales of a life well-lived. With a grizzled coat that once shimmered in shades of ebony, now peppered with flecks of gray, Whisper stands tall and proud. His powerful frame bears the marks of countless adventuresâ€”a few scars here and there, remnants of past escapades that have sculpted his rugged appearance. Despite his age, his eyes retain a glimmer of wisdom, sparkling like orbs of polished amber.
Personality Trait: Experienced Whisper's age has bestowed upon him a deep well of experience. He exudes an air of confidence and quiet strength, having witnessed the ebb and flow of the world. He possesses an uncanny ability to navigate treacherous terrain and make sound decisions, drawing from a wealth of knowledge accumulated over his many years of adventuring. Whisper's presence alone inspires trust in those who have the honor of riding alongside him.

Aurora

Rider: Sasha
Description: Aurora is a stunning mare, the embodiment of grace and elegance. Her coat shimmers like a metallic twilight, a deep shade of indigo kissed by hints of silver. With a long, flowing mane and tail that cascade like liquid ebony, Aurora cuts a striking figure against any landscape. Her sleek, well-defined muscles speak of agility and speed, while her dark, soulful eyes seem to hold the secrets of the night sky.
Personality Trait: Gentle Beneath her enchanting exterior, Aurora possesses a gentle nature that draws people to her. She is patient and nurturing, always mindful of the needs of those around her. Whether it's calming an anxious rider or leading a foal through their first steps, Aurora's innate compassion shines through. Her soothing presence is like a balm to weary souls, making her the ideal companion for long journeys and quiet moments of reflection.

Thunderbolt

Rider: Nyx
Description: Thunderbolt is a magnificent stallion, a true embodiment of power and vitality. His muscular physique is built for speed, with a glossy coat of ebony that seems to shimmer with every movement. Lightning-like streaks of white trace along his strong legs, accentuating the raw energy that emanates from his every stride. With eyes that gleam like liquid fire and a flowing mane that dances in the wind, Thunderbolt commands attention wherever he goes.
Personality Trait: Spirited Thunderbolt is an untamed spirit, possessing a fiery temperament that matches his electrifying presence. He is bold and adventurous, always eager to embark on new challenges. His boundless energy drives him to push the limits, surging forward with unrestrained enthusiasm. Thunderbolt's spirited nature can be contagious, igniting a sense of determination in those who ride alongside him, propelling them to reach greater heights.

Willow

Rider: Rhesus Hyrcanus
Description: Willow is a gentle and enchanting horse, with a coat that resembles the softest dappled sunlight filtering through a forest canopy. Her coat is a symphony of earthy hues, blending warm chestnut and golden highlights with hints of creamy white. Willow's delicate frame carries an ethereal grace, and her eyes are pools of calm, reflecting the serenity of nature itself.
Personality Trait: Serene Willow possesses an innate tranquility that sets her apart. She moves through the world with a quiet elegance, radiating a calming presence. Her gentle nature and patient demeanor make her an ideal companion for those seeking solace or moments of introspection. Willow has a remarkable ability to navigate difficult situations with grace and composure, inspiring a sense of peace in both her rider and those she encounters on their shared path.

Sunny

Ride: Kis Pebblebone
Description: This pony is a delightful sight, boasting a compact and sturdy build. Standing at a height that is shorter than a horse but taller than a miniature pony, its proportions are perfectly balanced. Its coat is a velvety chestnut, with a glossy sheen that catches the light. The pony's expressive eyes twinkle with intelligence and curiosity, framed by a soft, flowing mane and tail that match its rich chestnut color. With nimble hooves and a charming presence, this pony captures hearts with its endearing appearance.
Personality Trait: Playful Playfulness is a defining personality trait of this pony. It possesses a youthful spirit that shines through in its every action. Whether frolicking in a field or engaging in lighthearted games, the pony exudes an infectious energy that draws others to join in the fun. It possesses a mischievous streak, often using its cleverness and agility to entertain and engage its companions. Despite its small size, the pony's playful nature fills the air with a joyous atmosphere, bringing smiles and laughter to those fortunate enough to spend time with it.
